name: Reason for Being Solitary, Ouka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent's center stage has 1 or less characters, choose 1 of your opponent's characters in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -3000 power until end of turn.【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 1 or less other characters, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put that character onto any position of your back stage.

name: Acting Manager's Aide, Isuzu
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《AmaBri》 characters, this card gets +1000 power.【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Fantasia Bunko》 or 《AmaBri》 character, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's clock." (Return the revealed card to its original place)

text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the 【STANDBY】 effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as 【REST】)

name: Genius Mage & Swordswoman, Lina
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.【ACT】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] This card gets +1000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may draw 1 card."

name: Fulfilled Promise, Natsume & Harutora
text: 【CONT】 If this card has a marker underneath it, this card gets +3000 power.【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "Fulfilled Promise, Natsume & Harutora" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.
